```yaml
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  title: User Accounts API
  version: "1.0.0"
  description: REST API for managing user accounts with role-based access.
  contact:
    name: API Support
    email: api-support@example.com
    url: https://developer.example.com/support

servers:
  - url: https://api.example.com/v1
    description: Production

security:
  - bearerAuth: []

paths:
  /users:
    get:
      operationId: listUsers
      summary: List all user accounts with cursor-based pagination.
      parameters:
        - name: cursor
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Opaque cursor returned from a previous response to fetch the next page.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "eyJpZCI6IjllYjc2YTk4In0="
        - name: limit
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Maximum number of users to return per page.
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 100
            default: 20
            example: 20
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A paginated list of users.
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              description: Maximum requests per window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 1000
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              description: Requests remaining in the current window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 999
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              description: Seconds until the rate limit resets.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 3600
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserListResponse"
        "400":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        "500":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"
    post:
      operationId: createUser
      summary: Create a new user account.
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKey"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CreateUserRequest"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: User created successfully.
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              description: Maximum requests per window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 1000
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              description: Requests remaining in the current window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 999
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              description: Seconds until the rate limit resets.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 3600
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        "409":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Conflict"
        "500":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"

  /users/{userId}:
    parameters:
      - name: userId
        in: path
        required: true
        description: Unique identifier of the user.
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: "9eb76a98-2c3d-4e5f-a1b2-c3d4e5f6a7b8"
    get:
      operationId: getUser
      summary: Retrieve a single user account by ID.
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The requested user.
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              description: Maximum requests per window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 1000
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              description: Requests remaining in the current window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 999
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              description: Seconds until the rate limit resets.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 3600
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        "404":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
        "500":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"
    put:
      operationId: updateUser
      summary: Replace all mutable fields on a user account.
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKey"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateUserRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: User updated successfully.
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              description: Maximum requests per window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 1000
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              description: Requests remaining in the current window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 999
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              description: Seconds until the rate limit resets.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 3600
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        "404":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
        "409":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Conflict"
        "500":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"
    patch:
      operationId: patchUser
      summary: Partially update specific fields on a user account.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PatchUserRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: User patched successfully.
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              description: Maximum requests per window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 1000
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              description: Requests remaining in the current window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 999
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              description: Seconds until the rate limit resets.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 3600
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        "404":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
        "409":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Conflict"
        "500":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"
    delete:
      operationId: deleteUser
      summary: Permanently delete a user account.
      responses:
        "204":
          description: User deleted successfully.
          headers:
            X-RateLimit-Limit:
              description: Maximum requests per window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 1000
            X-RateLimit-Remaining:
              description: Requests remaining in the current window.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 999
            X-RateLimit-Reset:
              description: Seconds until the rate limit resets.
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: 3600
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        "404":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
        "500":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT

  parameters:
    IdempotencyKey:
      name: Idempotency-Key
      in: header
      required: true
      description: Unique UUID to ensure the request is processed exactly once.
      schema:
        type: string
        format: uuid
        example: "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"

  schemas:
    UserRole:
      type: string
      enum:
        - admin
        - user
        - viewer
      example: "user"

    User:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - email
        - name
        - role
        - isActive
        - createdAt
        - updatedAt
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique identifier for the user.
          example: "9eb76a98-2c3d-4e5f-a1b2-c3d4e5f6a7b8"
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
          description: Unique email address.
          example: "jane.doe@example.com"
        name:
          type: string
          description: Full name of the user.
          example: "Jane Doe"
        role:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserRole"
        isActive:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the account is active.
          example: true
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          description: Timestamp when the user was created.
          example: "2025-08-15T09:30:00Z"
        updatedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          description: Timestamp when the user was last updated.
          example: "2025-08-15T09:30:00Z"

    CreateUserRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - email
        - name
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
          description: Unique email address for the new user.
          example: "jane.doe@example.com"
        name:
          type: string
          description: Full name of the user.
          example: "Jane Doe"
        role:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserRole"
        isActive:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the account is active. Defaults to true.
          default: true
          example: true

    UpdateUserRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - email
        - name
        - role
        - isActive
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
          description: Unique email address.
          example: "jane.doe@example.com"
        name:
          type: string
          description: Full name of the user.
          example: "Jane Doe"
        role:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserRole"
        isActive:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the account is active.
          example: true

    PatchUserRequest:
      type: object
      minProperties: 1
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
          description: Unique email address.
          example: "jane.doe@example.com"
        name:
          type: string
          description: Full name of the user.
          example: "Jane Doe"
        role:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserRole"
        isActive:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether the account is active.
          example: false

    UserListResponse:
      type: object
      required:
        - data
        - nextCursor
        - hasMore
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          description: Array of user objects for the current page.
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
          example: []
        nextCursor:
          type: string
          nullable: true
          description: Opaque cursor to pass as the cursor query parameter for the next page. Null when there are no more pages.
          example: "eyJpZCI6IjllYjc2YTk4In0="
        hasMore:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether additional pages of results exist.
          example: true

    ProblemDetail:
      type: object
      description: Error response following RFC 7807.
      required:
        - type
        - title
        - status
        - detail
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          format: uri
          description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.
          example: "https://api.example.com/problems/validation-error"
        title:
          type: string
          description: A short human-readable summary of the problem.
          example: "Validation Error"
        status:
          type: integer
          description: The HTTP status code.
          example: 400
        detail:
          type: string
          description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence.
          example: "The field 'email' must be a valid email address."

  responses:
    BadRequest:
      description: The request body or parameters are invalid.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    Unauthorized:
      description: Authentication credentials are missing or invalid.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    NotFound:
      description: The requested resource was not found.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    Conflict:
      description: The request conflicts with existing state, such as a duplicate email.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
    InternalServerError:
      description: An unexpected server error occurred.
      content:
        application/problem+json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetail"
```","stop_reason":null,"session_id":"ee7a5e27-f872-428e-919c-9ced12ca3df6","total_cost_usd":0.13893275,"usage":{"input_tokens":3,"cache_creation_input_tokens":5839,"cache_read_input_tokens":25498,"output_tokens":3587,"server_tool_use":{"web_search_requests":0,"web_fetch_requests":0},"service_tier":"standard","cache_creation":{"ephemeral_1h_input_tokens":5839,"ephemeral_5m_input_tokens":0},"inference_geo":"","iterations":[],"speed":"standard"},"modelUsage":{"claude-opus-4-6":{"inputTokens":3,"outputTokens":3587,"cacheReadInputTokens":25498,"cacheCreationInputTokens":5839,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.13893275,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":32000}},"permission_denials":[],"uuid":"35f48fe3-92cd-43ad-96a9-aacd683e21f4"}
